name: The Shawshank Redemption (1994)

brief_introduction: A criminal pleads insanity after getting into trouble again and once in the mental institution rebels against the oppressive nurse and rallies up the scared patients.

brief_introduction: Jerry Lundegaard's inept crime falls apart due to his and his henchmen's bungling and the persistent police work of the quite pregnant Marge Gunderson.

name: Gran Torino (2008)
brief_introduction: Disgruntled Korean War veteran Walt Kowalski sets out to reform his neighbor, a Hmong teenager who tried to steal Kowalski's prized possession: a 1972 Gran Torino.

name: The Deer Hunter (1978)
brief_introduction: An in-depth examination of the ways in which the U.S. Vietnam War impacts and disrupts the lives of people in a small industrial town in Pennsylvania.

name: Finding Nemo (2003)
brief_introduction: After his son is captured in the Great Barrier Reef and taken to Sydney, a timid clownfish sets out on a journey to bring him home.

name: Idi i smotri (1985)
brief_introduction: After finding an old rifle, a young boy joins the Soviet resistance movement against ruthless German forces and experiences the horrors of World War II.

name: Sherlock Jr. (1924)
brief_introduction: A film projectionist longs to be a detective, and puts his meagre skills to work when he is framed by a rival for stealing his girlfriend's father's pocketwatch.

name: The Big Lebowski (1998)
brief_introduction: Jeff "The Dude" Lebowski, mistaken for a millionaire of the same name, seeks restitution for his ruined rug and enlists his bowling buddies to help get it.

name: Kill Bill: Vol. 1 (2003)
brief_introduction: After awakening from a four-year coma, a former assassin wreaks vengeance on the team of assassins who betrayed her.

name: Shutter Island (2010)
brief_introduction: In 1954, a U.S. Marshal investigates the disappearance of a murderer, who escaped from a hospital for the criminally insane.

name: Cool Hand Luke (1967)
brief_introduction: A laid back Southern man is sentenced to two years in a rural prison, but refuses to conform.

name: Rebecca (1940)
brief_introduction: A self-conscious bride is tormented by the memory of her husband's dead first wife.

name: T?ky? monogatari (1953)
brief_introduction: An old couple visit their children and grandchildren in the city; but the children have little time for them.

name: Mary and Max (2009)
brief_introduction: A tale of friendship between two unlikely pen pals: Mary, a lonely, eight-year-old girl living in the suburbs of Melbourne, and Max, a forty-four-year old, severely obese man living in New York.

name: Hacksaw Ridge (2016)
brief_introduction: World War II American Army Medic Desmond T. Doss, who served during the Battle of Okinawa, refuses to kill people, and becomes the first man in American history to receive the Medal of Honor without firing a shot.

name: Sunrise: A Song of Two Humans (1927)
brief_introduction: An allegorical tale about a man fighting the good and evil within him. Both sides are made flesh - one a sophisticated woman he is attracted to and the other his wife.

name: How to Train Your Dragon (2010)
brief_introduction: A hapless young Viking who aspires to hunt dragons becomes the unlikely friend of a young dragon himself, and learns there may be more to the creatures than he assumed.

name: Gone Girl (2014)
brief_introduction: With his wife's disappearance having become the focus of an intense media circus, a man sees the spotlight turned on him when it's suspected that he may not be innocent.

name: Relatos salvajes (2014)
brief_introduction: Six short stories that explore the extremities of human behavior involving people in distress.

name: Jurassic Park (1993)
brief_introduction: During a preview tour, a theme park suffers a major power breakdown that allows its cloned dinosaur exhibits to run amok.

name: Into the Wild (2007)
brief_introduction: After graduating from Emory University, top student and athlete Christopher McCandless abandons his possessions, gives his entire $24,000 savings account to charity and hitchhikes to Alaska to live in the wilderness. Along the way, Christopher encounters a series of characters that shape his life.

name: Eskiya (1996)
brief_introduction: The epic adventures of the legendary Baran the Bandit following his release from prison. After serving 35 years, it is no surprise that the world has changed dramatically. Still, Baran can't help but be shocked to discover that his home village is now underwater thanks to the construction of a new dam. He then heads for Istanbul to get revenge upon his former best friend, the man who snitched on him and stole his lover Keje. Along the way, Baran teams up with Cumali, a tough young punk who finds the thief's old-fashioned ways rather quaint. When Cumali gets into deep trouble with a crime boss, Baran adds another vengeful task to his roster./After serving a 35-year jail sentence, Baran, a bandit, is released from prison in a city in Eastern Turkey. The first thing he does is to return to the village he left. But the village has been long submerged under an artificial reservoir. Baran's undoing was Berfo, a friend who had once been closer to him than a brother. In order to snare Keje, Baran's sweetheart, Berfo seized his best friend gold and have Baran arrested by the gendarme on Mountain Cudi. Then Berfo purchases Keje from her father against her will, and disappears. According to rumor, he is in Istanbul. While traveling to Istanbul by train, Baran meets Cumali, a young man. Cumali was raised in the alleys of Beyoglu, his life revolving around bars, gambling joints, alcohol, dope and woman. Cumali dreams of joining the mafia and making it big. He takes Baran to a dilapidated hotel in the backstreet's of Beyoglu. After a while, Cumali and friends discover that Baran used to be a bandit, but they can't take it seriously. For them, it is just a laugh. Cumali's dreams of a new life include Emel, his girlfriend. Emel has a convict brother, who is in trouble with the other prisoners in his jail. His life is in danger, and he needs high amount of money to get out. Cumali promises Emel to get the Money for her brother as soon as possible. Meanwhile, the bandit is going through Istanbul in a daze, lost in totally alien world, with no idea where to start looking for the woman he loves and the mortal enemy who was stolen her...

name: Life of Brian (1979)
brief_introduction: Born on the original Christmas in the stable next door to Jesus, Brian of Nazareth spends his life being mistaken for a messiah.

name: A Star Is Born (2018)
brief_introduction: A musician helps a young singer find fame, even as age and alcoholism send his own career into a downward spiral.

name: It Happened One Night (1934)
brief_introduction: A spoiled heiress running away from her family is helped by a man who is actually a reporter in need of a story.

name: In the Name of the Father (1993)
brief_introduction: A man's coerced confession to an IRA bombing he did not commit results in the imprisonment of his father as well. An English lawyer fights to free them.

name: Platoon (1986)
brief_introduction: A young soldier in Vietnam faces a moral crisis when confronted with the horrors of war and the duality of man.

name: The Grand Budapest Hotel (2014)
brief_introduction: The adventures of Gustave H, a legendary concierge at a famous hotel from the fictional Republic of Zubrowka between the first and second World Wars, and Zero Moustafa, the lobby boy who becomes his most trusted friend.

name: Stand by Me (1986)
brief_introduction: After the death of a friend, a writer recounts a boyhood journey to find the body of a missing boy.

name: The Truman Show (1998)
brief_introduction: An insurance salesman/adjuster discovers his entire life is actually a television show.

name: Network (1976)
brief_introduction: A television network cynically exploits a deranged former anchor's ravings and revelations about the news media for its own profit.

name: Stalker (1979)
brief_introduction: A guide leads two men through an area known as the Zone to find a room that grants wishes.

name: Hotel Rwanda (2004)
brief_introduction: Paul Rusesabagina was a hotel manager who housed over a thousand Tutsi refugees during their struggle against the Hutu militia in Rwanda.

name: Ben-Hur (1959)
brief_introduction: When a Jewish prince is betrayed and sent into slavery by a Roman friend, he regains his freedom and comes back for revenge.

name: Persona (1966)
brief_introduction: A nurse is put in charge of a mute actress and finds that their personae are melding together.

name: Salinui chueok (2003)
brief_introduction: In a small Korean province in 1986, three detectives struggle with the case of multiple young women being found raped and murdered by an unknown culprit.

name: 12 Years a Slave (2013)
brief_introduction: In the antebellum United States, Solomon Northup, a free black man from upstate New York, is abducted and sold into slavery.

name: Andrei Rublev (1966)
brief_introduction: The life, times and afflictions of the fifteenth-century Russian iconographer.

name: Le salaire de la peur (1953)
brief_introduction: In a decrepit South American village, four men are hired to transport an urgent nitroglycerine shipment without the equipment that would make it safe.

name: Million Dollar Baby (2004)
brief_introduction: A determined woman works with a hardened boxing trainer to become a professional.

name: La passion de Jeanne d'Arc (1928)
brief_introduction: In 1431, Jeanne d'Arc is placed on trial on charges of heresy. The ecclesiastical jurists attempt to force Jeanne to recant her claims of holy visions.

name: Rush (2013)
brief_introduction: The merciless 1970s rivalry between Formula One rivals James Hunt and Niki Lauda.

name: Rang De Basanti (2006)
brief_introduction: The story of six young Indians who assist an English Woman to film a documentary on the extremist freedom fighters from their past, and the events that lead them to relive the long forgotten saga of freedom.

name: Mad Max: Fury Road (2015)
brief_introduction: In a post-apocalyptic wasteland, a woman rebels against a tyrannical ruler in search for her homeland with the aid of a group of female prisoners, a psychotic worshiper, and a drifter named Max.

name: Before Sunrise (1995)
brief_introduction: A young man and woman meet on a train in Europe, and wind up spending one evening together in Vienna. Unfortunately, both know that this will probably be their only night together.

name: Les quatre cents coups (1959)
brief_introduction: A young boy, left without attention, delves into a life of petty crime.

name: Spotlight (2015)
brief_introduction: The true story of how the Boston Globe uncovered the massive scandal of child molestation and cover-up within the local Catholic Archdiocese, shaking the entire Catholic Church to its core.

name: Prisoners (2013)
brief_introduction: When Keller Dover's daughter and her friend go missing, he takes matters into his own hands as the police pursue multiple leads and the pressure mounts.

name: Hachi: A Dog's Tale (2009)
brief_introduction: A college professor's bond with the abandoned dog he takes into his home.

name: Logan (2017)
brief_introduction: In the near future, a weary Logan cares for an ailing Professor X, somewhere on the Mexican border. However, Logan's attempts to hide from the world, and his legacy, are upended when a young mutant arrives, pursued by dark forces.

name: Amores perros (2000)
brief_introduction: A horrific car accident connects three stories, each involving characters dealing with loss, regret, and life's harsh realities, all in the name of love.

name: The Princess Bride (1987)
brief_introduction: While home sick in bed, a young boy's grandfather reads him a story called The Princess Bride.

name: Kaze no tani no Naushika (1984)
brief_introduction: Warrior/pacifist Princess Nausica? desperately struggles to prevent two warring nations from destroying themselves and their dying planet.

name: Catch Me If You Can (2002)
brief_introduction: A seasoned FBI agent pursues Frank Abagnale Jr. who, before his 19th birthday, successfully forged millions of dollars' worth of checks while posing as a Pan Am pilot, a doctor, and a legal prosecutor.

name: Butch Cassidy and the Sundance Kid (1969)
brief_introduction: Wyoming, early 1900s. Butch Cassidy and The Sundance Kid are the leaders of a band of outlaws. After a train robbery goes wrong they find themselves on the run with a posse hard on their heals. Their solution - escape to Bolivia.

name: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 2 (2011)
brief_introduction: Harry, Ron, and Hermione search for Voldemort's remaining Horcruxes in their effort to destroy the Dark Lord as the final battle rages on at Hogwarts.

name: Rocky (1976)
brief_introduction: A small-time boxer gets a supremely rare chance to fight a heavy-weight champion in a bout in which he strives to go the distance for his self-respect.

name: Barry Lyndon (1975)
brief_introduction: An Irish rogue wins the heart of a rich widow and assumes her dead husband's aristocratic position in 18th-century England.

name: Monsters, Inc. (2001)
brief_introduction: In order to power the city, monsters have to scare children so that they scream. However, the children are toxic to the monsters, and after a child gets through, 2 monsters realize things may not be what they think.

name: The Grapes of Wrath (1940)
brief_introduction: A poor Midwest family is forced off their land. They travel to California, suffering the misfortunes of the homeless in the Great Depression.

name: The Maltese Falcon (1941)
brief_introduction: A private detective takes on a case that involves him with three eccentric criminals, a gorgeous liar, and their quest for a priceless statuette.

name: Donnie Darko (2001)
brief_introduction: A troubled teenager is plagued by visions of a man in a large rabbit suit who manipulates him to commit a series of crimes, after he narrowly escapes a bizarre accident.

name: Les diaboliques (1955)
brief_introduction: The wife and mistress of a loathed school principal hatch a plan to murder him while having the perfect alibi. They carry out the plan...but then his body disappears.

name: The Terminator (1984)
brief_introduction: A seemingly indestructible android is sent from 2029 to 1984 to assassinate a waitress, whose unborn son will lead humanity in a war against the machines, while a soldier from that war is sent to protect her at all costs.

name: Dead Poets Society (1989)
brief_introduction: English teacher John Keating inspires his students to look at poetry with a different perspective of authentic knowledge and feelings.

name: Gandhi (1982)
brief_introduction: Gandhi's character is fully explained as a man of nonviolence. Through his patience, he is able to drive the British out of the subcontinent. And the stubborn nature of Jinnah and his commitment towards Pakistan is portrayed.

name: Sanjuro (1962)
brief_introduction: A crafty samurai helps a young man and his fellow clansmen save his uncle, who has been framed and imprisoned by a corrupt superintendent.

name: La haine (1995)
brief_introduction: 24 hours in the lives of three young men in the French suburbs the day after a violent riot.

name: Groundhog Day (1993)
brief_introduction: A weatherman finds himself inexplicably living the same day over and over again.

name: Le notti di Cabiria (1957)
brief_introduction: A waifish prostitute wanders the streets of Rome looking for true love but finds only heartbreak.

name: The Wizard of Oz (1939)
brief_introduction: Dorothy Gale is swept away from a farm in Kansas to a magical land of Oz in a tornado and embarks on a quest with her new friends to see the Wizard who can help her return home to Kansas and help her friends as well.

name: Blade Runner 2049 (2017)
brief_introduction: A young blade runner's discovery of a long-buried secret leads him to track down former blade runner Rick Deckard, who's been missing for thirty years.

name: La La Land (2016)
brief_introduction: While navigating their careers in Los Angeles, a pianist and an actress fall in love while attempting to reconcile their aspirations for the future.

name: Jaws (1975)
brief_introduction: When a killer shark unleashes chaos on a beach resort, it's up to a local sheriff, a marine biologist, and an old seafarer to hunt the beast down.

name: The Help (2011)
brief_introduction: An aspiring author during the civil rights movement of the 1960s decides to write a book detailing the African American maids' point of view on the white families for which they work, and the hardships they go through on a daily basis.

name: Faa yeung nin wa (2000)
main_actors/actresses: Tony Chiu-Wai Leung/Maggie Cheung/Ping Lam Siu
brief_introduction: Two neighbors, a woman and a man, form a strong bond after both suspect extramarital activities of their spouses. However, they agree to keep their bond platonic so as not to commit similar wrongs.

name: Paper Moon (1973)
brief_introduction: During the Great Depression, a con man finds himself saddled with a young girl who may or may not be his daughter, and the two forge an unlikely partnership.

name: Gangs of Wasseypur (2012)
brief_introduction: A clash between Sultan and Shahid Khan leads to the expulsion of Khan from Wasseypur, and ignites a deadly blood feud spanning three generations.

name: Mandariinid (2013)
brief_introduction: War in Georgia, Apkhazeti region in 1990. An Estonian man Ivo has stayed behind to harvest his crops of tangerines. In a bloody conflict at his door, a wounded man is left behind, and Ivo is forced to take him in.

name: Before Sunset (2004)
brief_introduction: Nine years after Jesse and Celine first met, they encounter each other again on the French leg of Jesse's book tour.

name: Paris, Texas (1984)
brief_introduction: Travis Henderson, an aimless drifter who has been missing for four years, wanders out of the desert and must reconnect with society, himself, his life, and his family.

name: Ah-ga-ssi (2016)
brief_introduction: A woman is hired as a handmaiden to a Japanese heiress, but secretly she is involved in a plot to defraud her.

name: Guardians of the Galaxy (2014)
brief_introduction: A group of intergalactic criminals are forced to work together to stop a fanatical warrior from taking control of the universe.

name: The Best Years of Our Lives (1946)
brief_introduction: Three World War II veterans return home to small-town America to discover that they and their families have been irreparably changed.

name: The Bourne Ultimatum (2007)
brief_introduction: Jason Bourne dodges a ruthless C.I.A. official and his Agents from a new assassination program while searching for the origins of his life as a trained killer.

name: PK (2014)
brief_introduction: An alien on Earth loses the only device he can use to communicate with his spaceship. His innocent nature and child-like questions force the country to evaluate the impact of religion on its people.

name: Pirates of the Caribbean: The Curse of the Black Pearl (2003)
brief_introduction: Blacksmith Will Turner teams up with eccentric pirate "Captain" Jack Sparrow to save his love, the governor's daughter, from Jack's former pirate allies, who are now undead.

name: Tenk? no shiro Rapyuta (1986)
main_actors/actresses: Anna Paquin/James Van Der Beek/Cloris Leachman
brief_introduction: A young boy and a girl with a magic crystal must race against pirates and foreign agents in a search for a legendary floating castle.

name: Swades: We, the People (2004)
brief_introduction: A successful Indian scientist returns to an Indian village to take his nanny to America with him and in the process rediscovers his roots.
